Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/St. Louis
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier signal problems near Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Halsted. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
